name: Oceans Mooloolaba

reviews.text: We booked a long way ahead of time, and payed the premium for the suite.
reviews.title: Stayed in the Noisy Room

reviews.text: The room is outstanding very clean, all the fittings and the view is amazing. The rooms are all a good size for a few days stay, kitchen has everything you need and the location is perfect.
reviews.title: Refresh weekend

reviews.text: Unfortunately only after going to bed did we realise that the main bedroom is next to the exhaust fans for the shopping mall/restaurant/bar next door. They are loud and go all night.
reviews.title: Oceans Mooloolaba holiday

reviews.text: Complained the next day and the front desk couldn't care less.
reviews.title: An ideal family holiday spot

reviews.text: For the amount you pay for the room, you would expect to be able to at least sleep.
reviews.title: Luxury resort with magnificient ocean views

description: Oceans Mooloolaba Beach, the only 5 star Mooloolaba Resort, is perfectly positioned directly opposite Mooloolaba Beach and in the center of Mooloolaba Esplanade. Walk out the door and choose from dozens of great restaurants, boutique shopping outlets and watch the ocean waves sparkle on the stunning Mooloolaba beach. 46 exquisite self contained luxury apartments and penthouses feature state of the art facilities, smart technology and modern design details.
